cause.description:
we are an organization based out of New Canaan High School in New Canaan, CT. we work with a variety of organizations in order to raise money and awareness about the tragedy occurring in Darfur, Sudan. car washes, benefit concerts, selling t-shirts and bracelets, and school programs have helped us to raise over $3000 so far... we also raise awareness through educational assemblies as well as contact government officials. please feel free to join or donate, we'd love to get as many people as possible in order to save darfur.
the organizations we donate to are... Save Darfur Coalition (www.savedarfur.org) American Refugee Commitee (www.arcrelief.org) Save the Children (www.savethechildren.org)
1. A government has no right to kill its own people.
2. Genocide cannot be ignored by the international population.
3. We cannot repeat history and allow innocent people to be slaughtered unjustly.
cause.name: Coalition for Darfur
